about_the_game:
Step into the gritty shoes of a notorious gangster navigating the treacherous streets of a sprawling metropolis. Drawing the relentless attention of law enforcement, your only objective becomes clear: evade capture for as long as humanly possible.

Your arsenal is your lifeline in this unforgiving cityscape. Utilize a diverse array of weapons, ranging from pistols and shotguns to high-powered assault rifles, to fend off waves of pursuing officers and rival gangs seeking to capitalize on your predicament. Your survival depends on quick reflexes and strategic thinking.

Vehicles are your ticket to freedom. Commandeer a variety of cars to outmaneuver your pursuers and make your daring getaway. With its open-world gameplay, adrenaline-pumping action, and relentless pursuit mechanics, it delivers a gaming experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat from start to finish.

Step into the gritty shoes of a notorious gangster navigating the treacherous streets of a sprawling metropolis. Drawing the relentless attention of law enforcement, your only objective becomes clear: evade capture for as long as humanly possible.

Your arsenal is your lifeline in this unforgiving cityscape. Your survival depends on quick reflexes and strategic thinking.

Vehicles are your ticket to freedom. Commandeer a variety of cars to outmaneuver your pursuers and make your daring getaway. With its open-world gameplay, adrenaline-pumping action, and relentless pursuit mechanics, it delivers a gaming experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat from start to finish.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.

name: G

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.

short_description: A thrilling open-world game where you play as a gangster evading the relentless pursuit of the police. Use weapons and vehicles to survive as long as you can in this gritty urban landscape.
